comment.author: 54135313@N05
comment._content: Could these photographs be from the May 27, 1911 "Dreamland" fire?

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Hi Rob, If the information on the negative envelope is correct, they're from 1902. I couldn't find any news reports of Coney Island fires in 1902, although Jeffrey Stanton notes a huge one in 1903 ("the Bowery from Steeplechase's entrance to Feltman's was completely consumed in flames"). There was a silent film made about the 1903 fire, The Great Fire Ruins, Coney Island -- would love to see that and compare, but haven't found anything except listings on the web so far. Too bad! Deb Wythe Digital Lab
